title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Local Cultural Field Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Mathematical concepts can be applied with over 80% accuracy in local cultural settings using augmented reality (AR) technology
The mobile learning system enables 100% recording and analysis of issues encountered during field-based learning
Based on regional cultural identity acquired during the learning process, learners can mathematically model real-life problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
